home.介绍: I like Nuxt3, its development is infinitely scalable and supports full stack development. I have successfully used Mysql, Redis database, and Socket connection on the server side, it's great.
home.热情所在: 9 years of coding experience and I'm still exploring and learning because I love coding. You can find my full project list here
home.兴趣爱好: Outside of programming, I enjoy photography, fitness and travel. If you happen to be in the same city where I live (currently in Chengdu), maybe we can go out for photos, workouts or coding together.
